pages.text: The $(item)Logistics Configurator's/$ primary purpose is to help out with configuring a $(l:logistics/overview)Logistics System/$.$(p)By $(thing)right-clicking/$ it on any $(l:logistics/frames)Logistic Frame/$ it can configure various filters.$(p)$(thing)Sneak right-clicking/$ removes the frame from the inventory it's attached to.

The $(item)Logistics Configurator/$ can also be used to remove (by $(thing)Sneak right-clicking/$) other attachable gadgets, such as the $(l:semiblocks/transfer_gadget)Transfer Gadget/$ and the $(l:semiblocks/crop_support)Crop Support/$.
